title: Way to troll me Riot

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Literally *the one* shard I have no use for whatsoever! I have the champion AND I am Mastery 7.

I mean, come on T_T

replies.body: Wow darn dude haha lol dude haha haha dude haha xd
Riot seriously screwed you this time oh heck!
